headline: S&P 500 Leader, IBD Stock Of The Day, Breaks Out To Record Highs
summary: Vistra broke out to record highs as energy demand booms on AI. VST stock has rallied 290% in 2024 to lead the S&P 500.

headline: Palantir, The Newest S&P 500 Stock, Is Leaving Nvidia In The Dust
summary: Palantir joined the S&P 500 in September. It's now the index's top performer in 2024, passing Nvidia and Vistra.
